bcbioSingleCell

  • News

Sample Barcode Metrics

Sample Barcode Metrics

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

# S4 method for seurat
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

Interesting group, to use for colors.

Value

data.frame with cellular barcodes as rows.

See also

sampleMetadata().

Other Quality Control Metrics: plotCellCounts, plotGenesPerCell, plotMitoRatio, plotMitoVsCoding, plotNovelty, plotReadsPerCell, plotUMIsPerCell, plotUMIsVsGenes, plotZerosVsDepth

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))
load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "seurat.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# bcbioSingleCell
metrics(bcb) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 500
#> Variables: 16
#> $ sampleID            <fctr> run1_AGAGGATA, run1_AGAGGATA, run1_AGAGGATA, r...
#> $ nUMI                <dbl> 6384, 8833, 3915, 3915, 4709, 9599, 3580, 3546,...
#> $ nGene               <int> 2634, 3052, 1906, 1808, 2108, 3531, 1668, 1721,...
#> $ nCoding             <dbl> 5900, 8070, 3620, 3604, 4029, 8922, 2799, 3080,...
#> $ nMito               <dbl> 241, 234, 103, 83, 452, 234, 556, 246, 225, 286...
#> $ log10GenesPerUMI    <dbl> 0.8989572, 0.8830433, 0.9129885, 0.9066077, 0.9...
#> $ mitoRatio           <dbl> 0.03775063, 0.02649157, 0.02630907, 0.02120051,...
#> $ nCount              <int> 55337, 71802, 34607, 34005, 44760, 76590, 37290...
#> $ sampleName          <fctr> M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_s...
#> $ description         <fctr> run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1...
#> $ fileName            <fctr> 20170915_Pool_ZG4780-1_S1_R1_001.fastq.gz, 201...
#> $ index               <fctr> 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2...

# seurat
metrics(seurat) %>% glimpse()
